titleStmt.title: The answere vnto the nine points of controuersy, proposed by our late soueraygne (of famous memory) vnto M. Fisher of the Society of Iesus And the reioynder vnto the reply of D. Francis VVhite minister. With the picture of the sayd minister, or censure of his writings prefixed.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, 1569-1641.

titleStmt.title: The answere vnto the nine points of controuersy, proposed by our late soueraygne (of famous memory) vnto M. Fisher of the Society of Iesus And the reioynder vnto the reply of D. Francis VVhite minister. With the picture of the sayd minister, or censure of his writings prefixed.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, 1569-1641.
Floyd, John, 1572-1649.

notesStmt.note: Includes an answer to: White, Francis. A replie to Jesuit Fishers answere to certain questions propounded by King James.
Place of publication and identification of printer from STC.
According to STC, a reissue of the 1625 edition, with "The true picture of D. White minister" prefixed with a new title page. This section is signed: I.F., i.e. John Fisher? John Floyd?.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
